Bridging the Gap in the Provision: Na-edozi oghere dị n'ọkwa ahụ Ọrụ nlekọta ahụike na Nigeria
Our E-health platform offers video consu: Ikpokoro ahụike E-health anyị na-enye ndụmọdụ vidiyo na ndị dọkịta ọkachamara n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ọgwụ. Nke a na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ nke bụ nke mbụ ụdị ya na Nigeria, na-eweta mgbanwe na ndụmọdụ ụlọ ọgwụ, na-eji nkà na ụzụ eme ihe site na telemedicine. Site na ikpo okwu ahụike E-health anyị, ndị Nigeria niile, ebe ọ bụla ha nọ, nwere ugbu a nweta ọrụ nlekọta ahụike adịchaghị mma..
Log on to our website and click on the \: Banye na webụsaịtị anyị wee pịa bọtịnụ "Kpọtụrụ E-health" wee họrọ dọkịta masịrị gị yana ụbọchị/oge ị ga-eme.
An email will be sent to you to make pay: A ga-ezigara gị ozi-e iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka ndụmọdụ ahụ. Pịa kwụọ ụgwọ ugbu a, wee kwụọ ụgwọ n'ịntanetị site na iji kaadị akụ ma ọ bụ nyefe gị
Once payment is confirmed, an email with: Ozugbo enwetara ịkwụ ụgwọ, a ga-ezigara gị email nwere njikọ ndụmọdụ ka ị nwee ike ịbanye n'oge a kara aka site na ịpị njikọ ahụ.
What are some benefits of using the E-he: Kedu uru ụfọdụ dị na iji ikpo okwu E-health?
E-health distinguishes itself as the fir: E-health na-ekewa onwe ya dị ka usoro izizi telemedicine nke onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọgwụ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma nke emere iji nye ahịrị ọnụ ahịa niile n'okpuru otu ikpo okwu - nyocha & nyocha, ruo na ndenye ọgwụ na ntinye akwụkwọ nyocha.
Standing out from other telemedicine pro: Na-apụta site na ndị na-enye telemedicine ndị ọzọ, E-health na-enye ohere dị iche iche nke ndị ọkachamara n'ofe mpaghara dị iche iche nke ọgwụ (nlekọta multidisciplinary) n'okpuru otu ikpo okwu.
E-health has a two-way add-on feature th: E-health nwere ihe mgbakwunye ụzọ abụọ nke na-enye onye ọrịa ohere ịkpọ onye òtù ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ enyi na ndụmọdụ ma n'otu oge ahụ na-enye onye na-ahụ maka ahụike ohere ịkpọ onye ọrụ ibe ya n'ihe gbasara ọtụtụ ndụmọdụ ma ọ bụ mgbagwoju anya. Ọ na-enyekwa mgbanwe nke ịhọrọ ọpụrụiche ma ọ bụ ọkachamara na oge nhọpụta masịrị
What is the mode of payment on E-health?: Kedu usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ na ahụike E-health?

How much is a consult on the E-health pl: Ego ole bụ ndụmọdụ n'elu ikpo okwu E-health?
